metadata.title: BREXD | Global Trade, Engineering & Technology
metadata.description: Multinational company connecting Brazil, the USA, and China through solutions in export, import, engineering, agribusiness, and technology.

0.title: We move over
0.desc: Integrated export and import operations with full container management, customs clearance, and door-to-door logistics in 18 countries.

1.title: We supply materials for
1.desc: Production and distribution of asphalt materials, heavy machinery leasing, and engineering applied to major highway and industrial projects.

2.title: We process
2.desc: From fertilizer production to poultry processing plant operations, we integrate the entire Brazilian agribusiness chain to serve the world's largest markets.

3.title: Over
3.desc: Manufacturing, importing, and distributing electric kick scooters and scooters for the Latin American market, with technical assistance and original parts.

aboutIntro.title: A Brazilian company with
aboutIntro.desc: BREXD was born from the vision of integrating Brazil's productive potential with the world's largest markets. With offices in Sao Paulo, Miami, and Shanghai, we serve as a strategic bridge between three continents.
aboutIntro.yearDesc: Founded in Sao Paulo with a global vision

0.title: Export
0.desc: Full management of export operations with a focus on containers. We coordinate shipments of Brazilian goods to over 18 countries, with customs clearance, cargo consolidation, and door-to-door tracking.

1.title: Import
1.desc: Strategic import of industrial inputs, machinery, and consumer goods via containers from major hubs in China, Europe, and North America, with customs nationalization and delivery to the final destination.

2.title: Engineering
2.desc: Production and supply of asphalt materials for highway projects, plus leasing and operation of heavy machinery — excavators, motor graders, road rollers — for major infrastructure projects.

3.title: Agribusiness
3.desc: Integrated operations across the agribusiness chain: production and distribution of fertilizers for large-scale farming and operation of poultry processing plants with slaughter and processing capacity for export.

4.title: Technology
4.desc: Manufacturing, importing, and distributing electric kick scooters and scooters for the Latin American market. Proprietary technical assistance network and original parts supply throughout Brazil.

0.title: LATAM Container Operation — Santos-Shanghai-Miami Route
0.desc: Structuring a triangular logistics corridor for the movement of 4,800 containers per semester between Brazil, China, and the United States, with consolidation and deconsolidation at proprietary terminals.

1.title: BR-163 Paving — Mato Grosso Section
1.desc: Supply of 48,000 tons of asphalt mix and operation of a heavy machinery fleet for paving 180 km of the BR-163 highway, including earthwork, drainage, and signage.

2.title: Fertilizer Plant — Araguaia Complex
2.desc: Deployment of an NPK fertilizer mixing and granulation unit with a capacity of 360,000 tons/year, integrated with a railway terminal for nationwide distribution.

3.title: Poultry Processing Plant — Cascavel Unit
3.desc: Construction and operation of a processing plant with a slaughter capacity of 320,000 birds/day, SIF certification, and export authorization for Arab and Asian markets.

4.title: Electric Scooter Distribution — MoveGreen Project
4.desc: Import, assembly, and distribution of 35,000 electric kick scooters and scooters for micromobility operators in 12 Brazilian state capitals, with a proprietary technical assistance network.

0.desc: Administrative center, engineering, agribusiness, and technology hub.

1.desc: International trade and compliance hub for the Americas.

2.desc: Sourcing center, logistics, and gateway to Asia.

homeCta.title: Let's build the future
homeCta.desc: Discover how BREXD can drive your business across continents. Our team is ready to assist you.

home.segments_subtitle: Five integrated divisions driving global growth across different industries and continents.
home.presence_subtitle: Strategically positioned across three continents to serve our clients worldwide.
home.partners_subtitle: We partner with the world's most recognized companies across all our segments.
home.cta_subtitle: Partner with BREXD and unlock new opportunities across continents.
home.blog_subtitle: Expert analysis and industry perspectives from our global team.

about.hero_subtitle: 28 years connecting markets, building infrastructure, and driving innovation across continents.

timeline.1997: Founded in Sao Paulo, Brazil, as a small trading company focused on connecting Brazilian exporters with international markets.
timeline.1997_detail: Ricardo Brenner launched BREXD with the vision of connecting Brazilian producers to global demand, starting with agricultural commodities.
timeline.2001: Completed the first import operation from China, establishing a strategic Asia-Brazil trade corridor.
timeline.2001_detail: Recognized the immense potential of Chinese manufacturing and began importing industrial equipment and electronics for Brazilian distributors.
timeline.2004: Engineering and Construction Division launched, expanding into infrastructure projects in Brazil.
timeline.2004_detail: Leveraged our trade expertise to supply materials and manage the construction of port terminals and logistics facilities.
timeline.2007: Opened a Miami office to serve as an Americas hub, strengthening compliance and international trade capabilities.
timeline.2007_detail: The Miami office provided strategic access to North American markets, banking infrastructure, and regulatory compliance.
timeline.2010: Expanded into agribusiness with direct commodity trading operations, connecting farms to global markets.
timeline.2010_detail: Partnered with major agricultural cooperatives in Brazil, facilitating exports of soybeans, coffee, and sugar to Asia and Europe.
timeline.2013: Established a Shanghai office, creating a direct presence in the world's largest manufacturing ecosystem.
timeline.2013_detail: The Shanghai office enabled direct sourcing, quality control, and logistics management for our growing import operations.
timeline.2016: Technology Division launched, bringing digital transformation solutions to traditional industries.
timeline.2016_detail: Began developing proprietary platforms for supply chain tracking, agricultural monitoring, and engineering project management.
timeline.2018: Achieved the first fully integrated operation combining trade, engineering, and technology in a single project.
timeline.2018_detail: Delivered a $200M port terminal project that included imported Chinese equipment, Brazilian construction, and custom monitoring technology.
timeline.2020: Reached $1B in annual operations, consolidating our position as a major multinational platform.
timeline.2020_detail: Despite global challenges, our integrated model proved resilient, with diversified operations across multiple segments and geographies.
timeline.2022: Obtained ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 certifications, formalizing our commitment to quality and environmental standards.
timeline.2022_detail: The certifications covered all three offices and five business segments, ensuring consistent quality and sustainability practices globally.
timeline.2024: Launched a proprietary digital tracking platform for real-time supply chain visibility across all operations.
timeline.2024_detail: The platform integrates IoT sensors, satellite imagery, and AI analytics to provide end-to-end visibility from origin to destination.
timeline.2025: Reached $3.2B in revenue with a team of 350+ professionals across three continents.
timeline.2025_detail: Positioned for the next chapter of growth with expanded technology capabilities, new market entries, and a strengthened leadership team.

about.mission_text: Connect markets, build infrastructure, and drive innovation across continents to generate sustainable growth for our partners and communities.
about.vision_text: To be the most trusted multinational platform connecting Latin America, North America, and Asia through integrated solutions in trade, engineering, agribusiness, and technology.
about.team_subtitle: A diverse team of industry veterans driving BREXD's global operations.

ricardo.name: Ricardo Brenner
ricardo.title: CEO & Founder
ricardo.bio: 28 years leading BREXD from a small Sao Paulo trading firm to a $3.2B multinational. Ricardo's vision of integrated intercontinental solutions has transformed how companies operate across borders.

catherine.name: Catherine Mitchell
catherine.title: Chief Operating Officer
catherine.bio: Former McKinsey partner with 18 years in global operations. Catherine oversees day-to-day operations across all five segments and three offices, driving operational excellence.

wei.name: Wei Zhang
wei.title: VP Asia Operations
wei.bio: 15 years of experience in China-Latin America trade. Wei leads our Shanghai office and manages relationships with over 200 manufacturing partners across Asia.

ana.name: Ana Paula Ferreira
ana.title: Chief Financial Officer
ana.bio: Former Goldman Sachs VP with deep expertise in international finance, trade credit, and foreign exchange risk management in emerging markets.

marcus.name: Marcus Thompson
marcus.title: VP Engineering & Construction
marcus.bio: Licensed engineer with 20 years in infrastructure. Marcus has overseen $2B+ in construction projects including port terminals, processing plants, and logistics facilities.

juliana.name: Juliana Santos
juliana.title: VP Technology & Innovation
juliana.bio: MIT-trained engineer who built BREXD's technology division from scratch. Juliana leads the development of our proprietary digital platforms and AI-powered solutions.

diego.name: Diego Ramirez
diego.title: VP Commercial
diego.bio: Fluent in five languages with deep relationships in 18 countries. Diego leads our global sales team and manages strategic partnerships worldwide.

luciana.name: Dr. Luciana Motta
luciana.title: Chief Compliance & Legal Officer
luciana.bio: International trade law specialist with a PhD from USP. Luciana ensures BREXD operates at the highest standards of regulatory compliance across all jurisdictions.

about.offices_subtitle: Strategically positioned across three continents to serve our clients worldwide.
